scripts.test-init: cd ~/Projects/AutoBDD && . .autoPathrc.sh && cd - && cd ./e2e-test/test-init && xvfb-runner.sh npx wdio abdd.js
scripts.test-browser: cd ~/Projects/AutoBDD && . .autoPathrc.sh && cd - && cd ./e2e-test/test-browser && xvfb-runner.sh npx wdio abdd.js
scripts.test-table: cd ~/Projects/AutoBDD && . .autoPathrc.sh && cd - && cd ./e2e-test/test-table && xvfb-runner.sh npx wdio abdd.js
scripts.test-webpage: cd ~/Projects/AutoBDD && . .autoPathrc.sh && cd - && cd ./e2e-test/test-webpage && xvfb-runner.sh npx wdio abdd.js
scripts.test-postman: cd ~/Projects/AutoBDD && . .autoPathrc.sh && cd - && cd ./e2e-test/test-postman && xvfb-runner.sh npx wdio abdd.js
scripts.test-demoapp: cd ~/Projects/AutoBDD && . .autoPathrc.sh && cd - && cd ./e2e-test/test-demoapp && xvfb-runner.sh npx wdio abdd.js
scripts.smoke-test: npm run test-init & npm run test-browser
scripts.e2e-test: npm run test-webpage & npm run test-demoapp
